duties_responsibilities.duty: Administering medications and injections at the intermediate care facility.
Assisting medical coordinators with tracking individuals' medical appointments and ensuring follow-ups are done.
Assisting individuals on medical appointments when needed.
Observing individuals and reporting changes in their condition.
Performing medical procedures as directed by RNs.

education_certification.credential: LPN license, High School Diploma/GED, Valid Driver's license
